title: Argentina’s economy sees year-on-year growth following Milei’s controversial austerity measures
description:
Medellín, Colombia – Argentina’s economy recorded a surge of 7.7% in April 2025 compared to the same month last year, outperforming projected growth rates for the Latin American nation.

Since the second half of 2024, the country has continued to emerge from its recession. According to a June report...

title: The two faces of Milei’s Argentina: Trips abroad are increasing, but many can’t make ends meet
description:
The economic recovery is concentrated in the wealthiest sectors of society, while the middle and lower classes are cutting back and suffering from rising unemployment
